solution_line_template: If there are {total_calories_cheesecake} calories in every cheesecake, and each slice of cheesecake contains {calories_per_slice} calories, then the cheesecake has {total_calories_cheesecake}/{calories_per_slice}=<<{total_calories_cheesecake}/{calories_per_slice}={total_slices_cheesecake}>>{total_slices_cheesecake} slices.
If Kiley ate 25% of the cheesecake, then she ate {total_slices_cheesecake}*{kiley_ate_percent}=<<{total_slices_cheesecake}*{kiley_ate_percent}={slices_kiley_ate}>>{slices_kiley_ate} slices of cake.
